_comment: Example LoRA mapping file for batch_quantize.py
_description: Maps model filenames to their corresponding LoRA files. Supports single LoRA (string) or multiple LoRAs (list).
_notes: Keys can be full filenames or base names (without extension)
- A single string path for one LoRA
- A list of paths for multiple LoRAs (merged in order)
If using --lora-dir, you can omit the path and just provide the LoRA filename
Pattern matching is supported - partial matches will be tried if exact match fails
Multiple LoRAs are merged with dampening: each additional LoRA is scaled by 0.9^n
